name: The Man in the Iron Mask
summary_text: D'Artagnan and his fellow Musketeers plot to replace the ineffectual Louis XIV of France with his secretly imprisoned twin brother Phillipe, who is the firstborn and rightful King.

name: The House on 92nd Street
summary_text: Bill Dietrich becomes a double agent for the F.B.I. in a Nazi spy ring.

name: The Christmas Secret
summary_text: While her life is falling apart, single mom Christine finds a magical family heirloom that leads to love and good fortune during Christmas.

name: Le Amiche
summary_text: A young woman returns to her hometown of Turin to set up a new fashion salon and gets involved with a troubled woman and her three wealthy friends.

name: Confessions of a Sociopathic Social Climber
summary_text: A 28-year-old ad sales exec stops at nothing to climb her way to the top of the San Francisco social ladder.

name: Il a déjà tes yeux
summary_text: When French-African couple Paul and Sali discover the longed-for baby they are about to adopt is white, family chaos and confrontation ensue.

name: God Loves Caviar
summary_text: The Greek pirate who turned businessman, Ioannis Varvakis, made his fortune selling caviar in Russia and all over the world. Varvakis strives all his life for freedom for himself and then for his country.

name: Cherish
summary_text: After a martini-induced rampage, a fantasy-prone young woman is placed under house arrest.

name: 13 Rue Madeleine
summary_text: When spy chief Bob Sharkey finds out one of his agents-in-training is actually a Nazi double agent, his strategic decision not to arrest him results in tragedy.

name: Slow Learners
summary_text: Jeff and Anne, two close friends and co-workers, are embarrassingly unlucky at love. They hatch a plan to transform themselves over the course of a sex-and-alcohol-fueled summer.

name: Celebrity Sex Tape
summary_text: When a group of nerds leak a washed-up celebrity's sex tape, the publicity revives the actress's career and other Hollywood rejects want to star in the guys next "production."

name: Being Cyrus
summary_text: "Being Cyrus" is a dark, comedic venture by the debutante director Homi Adajania that spins around the Sethnas - a Parsi family.

name: Spring Break
summary_text: Two sets of two college guys spend a spring break together in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. There they have lots of fun in and out of the sun.

name: Jim Jefferies: I Swear to God
summary_text: Politically incorrect Australian comedian Jim Jefferies performs.

name: Combat Shock
summary_text: A dangerously disturbed Vietnam veteran struggles with life 15 years after his return home, and slowly falls into insanity from his gritty urban lifestyle.

name: Adam and Eve
summary_text: Adam and Eve start dating in college. Eve wants to remain a virgin until...? Neither Adam's nor Eve's roomies understand them.

name: Crackerjack
summary_text: When dwindling membership and increasing overheads makes a local bowling club and prime candidate for a takeover, it's all hands on deck to save the club, in what turns into an epic battle ...                See full summary »

name: Getting Any?
summary_text: Obsessed with the idea of owning his first car so he can have sex in it, a young man takes any job he can find and ends up in an escalating series of crazy situations.

name: The Mack
summary_text: Goldie returns from five years at the state pen and winds up King of the pimping game. Trouble comes in the form of two corrupt white cops and a crime lord who wants him to return to the small time.

name: Berlin, I Love You
summary_text: Latest installment of the Cities of Love series (Paris, je t'aime / New York, I Love You / Rio, Eu Te Amo), this collective feature film is made of ten stories of romance set in the German capital.

name: Capone
summary_text: The story of the rise and fall of the infamous Chicago gangster Al Capone and the control he exhibited over the city during the prohibition years.

name: Ekvtime: Man of God
summary_text: Man who was a Guardian of The National Treasure of his homeland Sakartvelo (Georgia) in France placed in 39 big boxes, did not lose any item and brought it back in 1945 after 24 years of struggle and became a national hero.

name: Thumper
summary_text: Teens in a low income neighborhood are lured into working for a violent and dangerous drug dealer. When a new girl harboring a dark secret arrives in town, their relationship jeopardizes everything.

name: The Black Room
summary_text: A young couple moves into their dream house, which quickly becomes a living nightmare upon discovering a demonic secret awaiting them perennially in the cellar - with unholy pleasures, fear feasting and a brute for all who cross its' path.

name: Traded
summary_text: In the 1880s western "Traded", a father must leave his ranch for Dodge City to save his daughter from an old enemy, putting his reputation as the fastest draw in the west to the test.

name: Numb
summary_text: When a couple in financial distress discover GPS coordinates that promise to lead to stolen gold they must partner with a pair of mysterious hitchhikers to enter the remote winter wilderness to recover the coins.

name: A Royal Winter
summary_text: While on a last-minute European holiday, a young woman finds herself in the middle of a real-life fairy tale when a chance meeting with a handsome local leads to something more.

name: Hero No. 1
summary_text: Timid Rajesh Malhotra escapes his tyrant father and meets Meena in a foreign land. The two lovers decide to marry, but when Meena's parents object, Rajesh decides to win them over in the quirkiest way.

name: Far from Home: The Adventures of Yellow Dog
summary_text: Teenage Angus adopts a stray dog and names him Yellow. Several days later, while traveling along the coast of British Columbia with Angus' father, John, the boy and dog become stranded when...                See full summary »

name: The Main Event
summary_text: A bankrupt entrepreneur attempts to recoup some of her losses by getting a washed-out boxer she picked up as a tax loss back into the ring - an idea her protégé isn't fond of.

name: Faubourg 36
summary_text: A man is charged with murder. He is Pigoil, the aging stage manager at Chansonia, a music hall in a Paris faubourg. His confession is a long flashback to New Year's Eve, 1935, when he ...                See full summary »

name: It's a Wonderful World
summary_text: When a tycoon is accused of murder, the private eye tracking him finds himself roped in as an accessory and attempts to evade police, kidnapping a poetess along the way.

name: The Lives of a Bengal Lancer
summary_text: Three British soldiers on the Northwest Frontier of India struggle against the enemy - and themselves.

name: Kiss and Cry
summary_text: A romantic drama based on the story of Carley Allison, a promising 18-year-old figure skater and singer who made medical history in her fight against a rare 1 in 3.5 billion type of sarcoma.

name: Gyakuten saiban
summary_text: This movie is based on the second and fourth cases in the popular video game Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney. The plot follows Phoenix Wright, a novice lawyer, who faces off against expert ...                See full summary »

name: Vamp U
summary_text: After killing his love, Mary, vampire Wayne can't grow his teeth. To pass the time he becomes a professor. Everything changes when he turns Chris, a dead ringer for his long dead love and her taste for blood spins out of control.

name: House of Fools
summary_text: In the midst of the Chechen War, a remote psychiatric institution is left without staff leaving the patients to fend for themselves. Based on a true story.

name: The World, the Flesh and the Devil
summary_text: A miner trapped in a cave-in resurfaces, and upon discovering mankind has been wiped out in a nuclear holocaust, sets out to find other survivors.

name: Crisis
summary_text: A small-town piano teacher is shocked by the arrival of her foster daughter's real mother, whose young lover soon follows and causes further disruption.

name: Boar
summary_text: In the harsh, yet beautiful Australian outback lives a beast, an animal of staggering size, with a ruthless, driving need for blood and destruction. It cares for none, defends its territory with brutal force, and kills with a raw, animalistic savagery unlike any have seen before.

name: Wood Job!: Kamusari nânâ nichijô
summary_text: After failing to get into university, a soft city boy randomly picks a job in forestry.

name: Night Skies
summary_text: March 13, 1997. Five friends bound for Las Vegas accidentally hit a stalled truck belonging to an ex-soldier. Stranded together on an isolated country road, they are about to witness one of the largest UFO sightings in history.

name: Garage Days
summary_text: The story of a young garage band in Sydney, Australia trying to make it big.

name: Little Woods
summary_text: A modern Western about two sisters who work outside the law to better their lives.

name: Girls with Balls
summary_text: After their van breaks down in the middle of nowhere, the women of a volleyball team must fight for their lives against a group of degenerate hunters.

name: A Little Bit Zombie
summary_text: Infected by a virus, a mild mannered HR manager attempts to fulfill his overwhelming desire for brains, all while trying to keep it together so as not to incur the wrath of his bridezilla-to-be.

name: To klama vgike ap' ton Paradeiso
summary_text: It is a parody, which mimics with a sweet and nostalgic mood the whole spectrum of the old Greek cinema of the 60's.

name: Fah talai jone
summary_text: With its loud acting style, exuberant sets and stunning shots in pastel colours, this Thai cult film is as much a parody as an homage to the Western and the romantic tearjerker.

name: Double Down
summary_text: A brilliant computer loner seizes Las Vegas and its terrorist attack, while fighting against his fits of clinical depression and obsession for romance and death.

name: American Skin
summary_text: A Marine veteran working as a school janitor tries to mend his relationship with his son after a divorce. When his son is killed by a police officer found innocent without standing trial, he takes matters into his own hands.

name: The Hottest State
summary_text: A young actor from Texas tries to make it in New York while struggling in his relationship with a beautiful singer/songwriter.

name: Hui Buh: Das Schlossgespenst
summary_text: Five hundred years ago, Hui Buh cheated in a card game, thus was turned into a ghost by thunder lighting. For all this time, he has lived in the castle alone without anyone to scare. Until ...                See full summary »

name: The Boys Next Door
summary_text: Roy and Bo leave their small California town the weekend after graduation for a short road trip to Los Angeles. Soon, they find themselves lashing out and leaving a trail of bodies behind them. The violence escalates throughout.

name: The Case of the Scorpion's Tail
summary_text: The Case of the Scorpion's Tail begins with the mysterious death of a millionaire and spirals into the murder of his suddenly rich wife, which draws the attention of a dogged investigator, who follows a trail of blood to the bitter end.

name: The Arrangement
summary_text: An adman attempts to rebuild his shattered life after suffering a nervous breakdown.

name: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions
summary_text: Yugi and Kaiba have a special duel that transcends dimensions.

name: Kandukondain Kandukondain
summary_text: An Indian adaptation of Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility" focusing on two sisters of opposing temperaments.

summary_text: Dominick and Eugene are twins, but Dominick is a little bit slow due to an accident in his youth. They live together, with Dominick working as garbage man to put Eugene through medical ...                See full summary »

name: The Boy with Green Hair
summary_text: This parable looks at public reaction when the hair of an American war orphan mysteriously turns green.

name: Monster Pies
summary_text: Mike has felt alienated and alone for as long as he can remember, until a new boy arrives at his school - awakening feelings and a world of possibilities he'd never before dared to dream of.

summary_text: A family must use a magical box of Animal Crackers to save a run-down circus from being taken over by their evil uncle Horatio P. Huntington.

name: Gun Shy
summary_text: An aging rock star's wife is kidnapped while vacationing in Chile.

name: Cardboard Boxer
summary_text: Gentle and broken, a homeless man is coerced by two teens to fight other men on video for cash but soon finds comfort in an unlikely friend and the lost diary of a young girl.

name: Nobels testamente
summary_text: Reporter Annika is at the Nobel prize awards, when shooting kills a woman and wounds an Israeli stem cell scientist. Annika is silenced as witness, so she investigates the killed woman while the press writes about the Israeli.

name: Darling
summary_text: To save himself from an unwanted marriage to a gangster's daughter, a man tells the story of reuniting with his childhood sweetheart in Switzerland.

name: Die Vermessung der Welt
summary_text: Germany in the early 19th century. "Die Vermessung der Welt" follows the two brilliant and eccentric scientists Alexander von Humboldt and Carl Friedrich Gauss on their life paths.

name: El baño del Papa
summary_text: A small South American village is in a flurry over the Pope's 1988 visit.

name: Testosteron

summary_text: A cheerleader and her friends need to make money quickly, so they begin selling sexual services.

summary_text: A grizzled ex-sheriff helps a man framed for murder to confront the powerful trio of brothers who want him dead.

summary_text: A mysterious and cruel Baron, whose face has become frozen in a horrifying grin, demands that a prominent London physician apply experimental treatments on him to restore his face.

summary_text: Three mysterious girls show up at canterlot high and cause trouble. With the magic of friendship, they want to defeat the mysterious girls.

summary_text: The story of the late jazz musician and classical pianist Nina Simone including her rise to fame and relationship with her manager Clifton Henderson.

summary_text: In the "flower houses" (upscale brothels) of Shanghai, various interweaving stories of love, loyalty, and deceit play out subtly.

summary_text: Subjected to bizarre, increasingly violent pseudo-scientific experiments in personality modification, brainwashing and mind control, Isabel must escape the clutches of the Rosewood Institute and exact her revenge, or else be forever lost.

summary_text: Former youth boxing champion Jimmy McCabe, after hitting rock bottom, returns to his childhood boxing club and his old team, gym owner Bill and corner-man Eddie.

summary_text: A self-help advocate struggles to put his dysfunctional family in its place.

name: Farewell to the King
summary_text: Borneo, 1942: An American soldier escapes WWII and becomes the king of the headhunters in the jungle. Two British soldiers are parachuted into the area to find local support for the battle against the Japanese.

summary_text: Fervidly dark lovesick horror inspired by the real-life criminal duo, the Lonely Hearts Killers.

name: Nordkraft
summary_text: The intense, realistic and unflinching tale of Maria, Allan and Steso, who are struggling for survival in urban life, about drugs.

summary_text: In a drab police state, an author of children's books is interrogated by a sadistic, secret policeman. She's under suspicion of embedding anti-government messages in her stories.

name: The Phantom Planet

name: Land

name: 'Til There Was You

name: Miss Conception

summary_text: Bobby Platt is a mentally slow young man who escapes an abusive, hateful stepfather who has killed his pets one by one. To save himself, Bobby runs away and meets a strange old man who ...                See full summary »

name: Lilies - Les feluettes
summary_text: When a bishop comes to a prison to hear the confession of an old friend he is forced to watch a play, performed by the inmates, about their youth together, love and betrayal.

name: 29th Street
summary_text: Frank's been lucky from the day, he was born. So why's he throwing rocks at a church after winning $6,200,000 in 1976 NYC lottery? He tells his story at the police station.

name: Demon City Shinjuku
summary_text: A young swordsman ventures into a disaster stricken Shinjuku, Tokyo, to try and stop a powerful man, who has made a deal with the demon realm, from opening a portal that will allow demons to cross over to the human world.

name: The Mummy's Curse
summary_text: Shipped to Louisiana, the mummy Kharis from Egypt roams the bayou, tormented by his forbidden love for Princess Ananka.

name: The Dark Tapes
summary_text: A genre-defying mixture of horror, sci-fi, myth, mystery and thrills told as four interlocking tales in one intelligent anthology. Ghosts, spirits, creatures, demons and more from the paranormal world collide with rational curiosity.

name: Il giovane favoloso
summary_text: Based upon the short but fruitful life of illness-racked Italian poet and philosopher Giacomo Leopardi.

name: Journal d'une femme de chambre
summary_text: A scheming servant works for a wealthy couple in France during the late 19th century.

name: Queen to Play
summary_text: A chambermaid on Corsica is obsessed with chess after seeing a US expat play it lovingly with l'Américaine. She cleans his house and now also plays with him on Tuesdays.

name: Meu Tio Matou um Cara
summary_text: Boy tries to help his uncle, guilty of a murder case, to prove his innocence. He thinks the uncle has confessed the crime as a cover-up for his girlfriend, who was the wife of the dead man....                See full summary »

name: Oddball
summary_text: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

name: Reach Me
summary_text: A self-help book changes the lives of different people in the LA area. Who is the reclusive writer?

name: Les témoins
summary_text: Paris, 1984: A group of friends contend with the first outbreak of the AIDS epidemic.

name: Carry on Up the Jungle
summary_text: Lady Evelyn Bagley mounts an expedition to find her long-lost baby. Bill Boosey is the fearless hunter and guide. Prof. Tinkle is searching for the rare Oozalum bird. Everything is going swimmingly until a gorilla enters the camp.

name: The Horror of Party Beach
summary_text: Sea creatures created from radioactive sludge terrorize a beach community.

name: Once Upon a Honeymoon
summary_text: In Europe at the start of World War II, a woman notices that wherever her husband goes, the Nazis seem to follow. Meanwhile, a charming reporter is following them.

name: Unbroken: Path to Redemption
summary_text: The next amazing chapter of Olympian and World War II hero Louis Zamperini's powerful true story of forgiveness, redemption, and amazing grace.

name: Cherry Crush
summary_text: A seventeen-year-old photographer gets caught up in murder when he breaks his own rules and falls in love with one of his teenage models.

name: The Burning Bed
summary_text: An abused battered wife has had enough of husband beating up on her. Everywhere she turns for help, there's not much anyone will do. After he rapes her one night, she sets the bed on fire with him in it asleep.

name: The Black Scorpion
summary_text: Volcanic activity frees giant scorpions from the earth who wreak havoc in the rural countryside and eventually threaten Mexico City.

name: De bende van Oss
summary_text: Netherlands, 1938. In a small town in the province of North Brabant called Oss, Johanna wants to change her life and quit the criminal gangs of the town. The harder she tries, the more she is involved.

name: Vanishing Point
summary_text: An ex race car driver hurries 1200 miles home in a 1970 Challenger when his wife has labor problems. Cops in several states try to stop him - initially for speeding.

name: Kaos
summary_text: Five stories by Luigi Pirandello set in turn-of-the-century Italy.

name: Chissà perché... capitano tutte a me
summary_text: Bud Spencer is, as always, getting into fights - especially after getting a job as sheriff. He's looking after a small boy who's actually an extraterrestrial with special abilities thus the military wants him. Bud's got his hands full.

name: The Editor
summary_text: A film editor gets embroiled in a string of murders.

name: Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins from Outer Space
summary_text: On Halloween, innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are -- mutant aliens.

name: Hex
summary_text: A couple's holiday romance is thrown into chaos as they are afflicted by a malicious force.

name: Qualunquemente
summary_text: Cetto La Qualunque comes back to Italy after having spent some years in another country. He decides to run for mayor in his little city.

name: Godhi Banna Sadharana Mykattu
summary_text: The film is about Venkob Rao (Anant Nag), a middle class simpleton ailing with Alzheimer's, who goes missing. His son, Shiva (Rakshit Shetty) is a career driven person, who is forced to ...                See full summary »

name: Ping Pong Summer
summary_text: A family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.

name: Hideaways
summary_text: James Furlong, motherless, discovered an extraordinary gift by accident which caused the death of his father and his grandmother.

name: Kattradhu Thamizh
summary_text: A young post-graduate faces difficulties with finding employment, and struggles against social inequalities.

name: The Wizard of Gore
summary_text: Montag the Magnificent (Glover) is a master illusionist who performs at underground venues, selecting female volunteers from his rave-like audiences. To their hysteria, it appears he's ...                See full summary »

name: Beast of Burden
summary_text: Sean Haggerty only has an hour to deliver his illegal cargo. An hour to reassure a drug cartel, a hitman, and the DEA that nothing is wrong. An hour to make sure his wife survives. And he must do it all from the cockpit of his Cessna.

name: Muxmäuschenstill
summary_text: A pseudo documentary study of an archetypal German who tries to model his world according to his ideas of law and (sexual) order.

name: Tumko Na Bhool Paayenge
summary_text: An amnesiac Hindu man remembers his past as a Muslim sharpshooter and an assassin.

name: L'uomo in più
summary_text: The debut feature by acclaimed Italian director Paolo Sorrentino (La Grande Bellezza) is a stylish and blackly comic look at the dark side of fame. Evocatively set during the eighties, the ...                See full summary »

name: An Awfully Big Adventure
summary_text: Set right after World War II, a naive teenage girl joins a shabby theatre troupe in Liverpool. During a winter production of Peter Pan, the play quickly turns into a dark metaphor for youth...                See full summary »

name: Freebie and the Bean
summary_text: San Francisco police detectives Freebie and Bean are determined to bust local crime boss Red Meyers at any cost, even if this means destroying the whole city in the process.

name: CIA: Comrade in America
summary_text: A young man in Kerala has two weeks to stop the woman he loves from a fixed marriage in the U.S., but he doesn't have the papers to get there.

name: Ji zhan
summary_text: Fai, once a world champion in boxing, escapes to Macau from the loan sharks and unexpectedly encounters Qi, a young chap who is determined to win a boxing match. Fai becomes Qi's mentor and...                See full summary »

name: Stolen Summer
summary_text: A Catholic boy tries to convert a terminally ill Jewish boy, so he will be able to go to Heaven.

name: The Favor
summary_text: With 15 year reunion coming up, Kathy has sexual fantasies of her high school sweetheart. She's married, so she sends her BFF to check him out and report back. Things get complicated.

name: In Between
summary_text: Three Palestinian women living in an apartment in Tel Aviv try to find a balance between traditional and modern culture.

name: Mickey Virus
summary_text: When Delhi Police comes across an unusual case revolving around hacking they seek help of an expert who thinks like them only to come across a lazy hacker Mickey Arora.

name: Camille redouble
summary_text: Camille was only sixteen and still in high school when she fell in love with Eric, another student. They later married and a child and were happy for a while. But now twenty-five years have...                See full summary »

name: Best Friends
summary_text: After five successful years of living and working together, a couple decide to get married. But what they don't count on is how to survive the honeymoon.

name: The Manitou
summary_text: A psychic's girlfriend finds out that a lump on her back is a growing reincarnation of a 400-year-old demonic Native American spirit.

name: The Russian Bride
summary_text: A Russian woman meets an older man on a dating site. She travels to America with her daughter to marry the man, who is a reclusive billionaire. He turns out to be a psycho, who sends their lives spiraling into a living hell. Will they manage to survive!

name: Turneja
summary_text: Year 1993, the bleakest time of war in Bosnia and Herzegovina. A group of actors from Belgrade, utterly unaware of what they're setting themselves up for, embark on a search for quick ...                See full summary »

name: Bleeders
summary_text: A man travels to an island with his girlfriend in search of his relatives, but he finds maybe more than what he wanted to know.

name: Madame Curie
summary_text: Despite himself, accomplished physicist and avowed bachelor Pierre Curie falls for brilliant student Marie, and together they embark on the discovery of radium.

name: Firestorm
summary_text: A storm is heading to the city, and with it comes another occurrence so destructive, it vows to bring down everything it touches. A crew of seasoned criminals led by the notorious Nam (Hu ...                See full summary »

name: Le mac
summary_text: A mild-mannered banker is forced to masquerade as a notorious gangster and pimp.

name: Pulse 2: Afterlife
summary_text: After ghosts invade the human world through the Internet, a father must protect his daughter from the psychotic spirit of his ex-wife.

name: Go
summary_text: Sugihara, born in Japan but with North Korean parents, falls in love with a Japanese girl after changing from a North Korean school to a Japanese school. His boxer dad teaches him boxing - skills used a lot.

name: Dream for an Insomniac
summary_text: Girl leads a lonely life until she meets the boy of her dreams. The boy, however, has a live-in girlfriend.

name: Green Snake
summary_text: Two snake spirits become human and learn about love and suffering. A monk discovers his own weaknesses and finds that morality is not as simple as he had thought.

name: There's Always Tomorrow
summary_text: When a toy manufacturer feels ignored and unappreciated by his wife and children, he begins to rekindle a past love when a former employee comes back into his life.

name: La prochaine fois je viserai le coeur
summary_text: For several months in 1978 and 1979, inhabitants of Oise live in fright and terror as a serial killer disturbs the peace and quiet.

name: Kerala Varma Pazhassi Raja
summary_text: Kerala Varma Pazhassi Raja is a 2009 Malayalam historical drama film based on the life of Pazhassi Raja, a Hindu king who fought against the British in the 18th century.

name: Photographing Fairies
summary_text: A 1997 fantasy film based on Steve Szilagyi's 1992 novel, Photographing Fairie.

name: Pokrov Gates
summary_text: Stories from the lives of the tennants of the Moscow's communal apatment: Kostik, who is a college student, lives with his aunt while studying; Arkady Velyurov who is a performing artist; ...                See full summary »

name: The Unsuspected
summary_text: The secretary of an affably suave radio mystery host mysteriously commits suicide after his wealthy young niece disappears.

name: In Family I Trust
summary_text: After finding out her boyfriend is cheating on her with a famous TV reporter, a woman goes back to her family home to find herself.

name: Rebellion
summary_text: Dissidents in a French overseas territory attack a police station and take hostages.

name: Brink of Life
summary_text: Three women in a maternity ward reveal their lives and intimate thoughts to each other while in a maternity ward together, where they face the choice of keeping their babies or offering them for adoption.

name: The Ticket
summary_text: A blind man who regains his vision finds himself becoming metaphorically blinded by his obsession for the superficial.

name: Endgame
summary_text: A story based on the covert discussions that brought down the Apartheid regime in South Africa.

name: Elvira Madigan
summary_text: The Danish tightrope dancer Elvira Madigan meets Lieutenant Sixten Sparre, a Swedish officer who is married and has two children. They both decide to run away.

name: Story of a Love Affair
summary_text: Paola is a young, beautiful woman married to a wealthy entrepreneur. She meets her former lover Guido after seven years, but their relationship is marked by tragic events.

name: The Lorax
summary_text: A ruined industrialist tells his tale of his environmentally self-destructive greed despite the warnings of an old forest creature.

name: Flying Colors
summary_text: Fact-based tale of a slacker high-school girl, years behind in her studies, who decides to start working hard and pass the entrance exams to a prestigious university in Japan.

name: Tayna tretey planety
summary_text: A group of peaceful space explorers find out a trail of a mysterious plot.

name: My Little Chickadee
summary_text: After a scandal runs a gold-digger out of town, she meets a con artist and becomes embroiled in a string of petty deceits.

name: Play the Game
summary_text: A young ladies' man teaches his dating tricks to his lonely, widowed grandfather, and plays his best mind games to meet the woman of his dreams.

name: Dane Cook: Vicious Circle
summary_text: Vicious Circle captures the hottest comic in America in his first HBO comedy event, a unique "in the round" performance before his hometown Boston fans.

name: Mystery Date
summary_text: Tom's in love with the cute house sitter next door. He's too shy but his older brother visits and helps Tom with the first date. Things don't go as planned.

name: White Mischief
summary_text: In 1940s Kenya, a married couple join other affluent British expatriates in a lifestyle of recklessness and excess, but soon find themselves in a troubling situation.

name: Aria
summary_text: Ten short films by ten different directors with nearly no speech but set to arias by different composers.

name: Uppena
summary_text: The plot revolves around the romantic love journey of two youngsters. Their smooth love story gets affected due to the situations and things take a dangerous turn. Can they stay safe and be helpful to each other in risky situations?

name: Varalaaru
summary_text: Shivshankar, a wheelchair-bound man, tries to make his son Vishnu aware of his responsibilities but to no avail. Things take a turn for the worse after Vishnu starts stealing and tries to rape a girl.

name: The Smokers
summary_text: Three rebellious teenage girls decide to even the score in the battle of the sexes.

name: Trash
summary_text: During the course of a day, a heroin addict overdoses in front of an upper-class couple, attempts to fool welfare by having his girlfriend fake a pregnancy, and frustrates the women in his life with his drug-induced impotence.

name: Katzelmacher
summary_text: Katzelmacher is more in line with Fassbinder's stage efforts, a character study and mini-melodrama in which the dynamic between a group of friends is radically altered by the arrival of an immigrant worker.

name: Roustabout
summary_text: After a singer loses his job at a coffee shop, he finds employment at a struggling carnival, but his attempted romance with a teenager leads to friction with her father.

name: Robert the Bruce
summary_text: The story of the nobleman-turned-outlaw hero who was crowned king of Scots in the 14th century.

name: Paiyaa
summary_text: The journey of two strangers: a jobless carefree man and the woman he has secretly fallen in love with. Upon her request, he drives her to Mumbai while a group of gangsters follow them, planning to kidnap the woman.
